## Checklist

- [ ] `go build ./...` passes
- [ ] `go test ./...` passes
- [ ] `golangci-lint run` passes
- [ ] `go mod tidy` produces no diff
- [ ] New/changed code has tests (80% coverage on services)
- [ ] No external I/O in tests (HTTP/DNS mocked)
- [ ] Commit messages use conventional format
